testcase.name: AC 1: Fleet Manager goes to products detail page when add options is selected then the add options wizard is opened
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 1: Fleet Manager goes to products detail page when add options is selected then the add options wizard is opened

testcase.name: AC 2: Fleet Manager opens the add options wizard when fleet manager he sees an option that is already in his sim line he can not add this option again
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 2: Fleet Manager opens the add options wizard when fleet manager he sees an option that is already in his sim line he can not add this option again

testcase.name: AC 3: Fleet Manager opens the add options wizard when fleet manager tried to add multiple options from the same cateogry only one is allowed
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 3: Fleet Manager opens the add options wizard when fleet manager tried to add multiple options from the same cateogry only one is allowed

testcase.name: AC 4: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he did not have another option from this category before then the added option is shown under the subtitle Added
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 4: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he did not have another option from this category before then the added option is shown under the subtitle Added

testcase.name: AC 5: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he already had an option in this category before then the added option is shown under the subtitle Updated
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 5: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he already had an option in this category before then the added option is shown under the subtitle Updated

testcase.name: AC 7: Fleet Manager added options in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then the options are removed from the overview
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 7: Fleet Manager added options in the wizard when he clicks on undo changes then the options are removed from the overview

testcase.name: AC 8: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then the options that are selected are in his SIM Line
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 8: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then the options that are selected are in his SIM Line

testcase.name: AC 9: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then he changes his mind and cancels it the manager is redirected to the wizard again
testcase.classname: Line Add Options AC 9: Fleet Manager adds an option in the wizard when he saves his changes then he changes his mind and cancels it the manager is redirected to the wizard again
